review: I cut cable and couldn't be happier!!  Amazon Fire Stick is more than enough tv for me especially with prime video and Sling app.  Seriously I saved $1,500 per year and the fire stick is seamless.  I absolutely love this set up!!!!! This is where tv is going and once again Amazon is right there. Amazon makes it so dang easy it was a no Brainerd.  I've also found some really good Amazon series such as Bosch. I've reAd all 22 Connelly books and the first series they produced is a rival for any prime time or HBO series out there! Really well done!A side note... I bought new 50" flat screens in addition to the fire sticks and in 2 days had a brand new set up!!

review: This was easier to start using than I thought it would be. It's basically plug and play. It's very intuitive once you start playing around with it. We are using it on a non-smart TV in our bedroom and it works great. I just wish the remote control could also control the volume on the TV so that I wouldn't have to use the other remote.

review: Freakin' LOVE my firestick. If you're an amazon prime member and haven't ordered one yet you are shortchanging yourself. there are hundreds of thousands of movies to choose from for prime members, as well as youtube,  sling tvvevo, vimeo,pbs kids, hbo-go, netflix and hulu, a gajillion apps....i couldn't be happier. I got my cable turned off because this thing is so awesome- i don't need it anymore. If you're a prime member- get one. now. Even if you're not a prime member you can still enjoy the awesomeness- but the firestick makes your prime membership SO WORTH IT. i'm not one to write reviews but I am all about this. Great product, great price- get one. Now.
